alert.note: Alert for Little Colorado River Valley in Apache County; White Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued March 28 at 1:59PM MST until March 30 at 4:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT THROUGH THURSDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Southwest winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts in excess of 65 mph. * WHERE...Areas near the White Mountains. * WHEN...From late Wednesday night through Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property and cause power outages. Travel could be difficult especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Little Colorado River Valley in Apache County; White Mountains
